inclusion.criterion: study staff member will describe the study and offer participation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient agrees to participate, signs research protocol and HIPAA consent forms
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: patient's chart is flagged indicating she is a study participant
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: allergy or adverse reaction to penicillin or ampicillin, gentamicin, or sulbactam
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: having received antibiotics for the treatment of preterm premature rupture of membranes or other condition within the last 7 days
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 12 year old girl with Turner syndrome, treating with GH. She has short stature, delayed puberty and developmental delay.
